name: Slideshow
description: Cycle through images from the Gallery widget with transitions

setImages.description: Set images to cycle through { images: [{ url, name? }] }

galleryChanged.description: Receive all images from Gallery { images: [] }

allImages.description: Receive all images from Gallery { images: [] }

addImage.description: Add a single image { url, name? }

imageAdded.description: Image added from Gallery { id, url, name }

currentImage.description: Emitted when current image changes { index, url, name, total }

playStateChanged.description: Emitted when play/pause state changes { playing: boolean }

slideClicked.description: Emitted when current slide is clicked { index, url, name }
